goals__remit: As more species decline towards extinction due to human activities, NEZS is tackling the threats head on by leading best practice in science, education and husbandry to create a sustainable future for wildlife. It does this by managing animal and plant populations, safeguarding habitats and empowering people to value nature and build conservation into their daily lives.
